Reviews.Title: too expensive and small posts very small posts
Reviews.Author: sparky
Reviews.Content: nice small sign posts which are like 8 inches long, really? Why are they so short. Hey the signs are nice but they are they 36 dollars for 3 signs. A rip off.

Reviews.Title: Good quality but not too tall
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Came in a reasonable time.  Signs were good enough quality for the price, but would like them to be taller.  The stickers were nice.

Reviews.Title: love these signs
Reviews.Author: bad service
Reviews.Content: i have cameras up in front of my house but i didn't have the signs.  the signs make me feel safer so people can see that we actually do have camera up for security. would buy them again.
